task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 9°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the entire building to estimate its height, but the top is currently cut off, so I will look up.
I can now see the entire building from base to roof, and by counting the approximate number of floors (around 8) and estimating each floor to be about 3 meters high, I can calculate the total height.
